metadata.Title: CVE-2012-6107 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low.
metadata.Description: Apache Axis2/C does not verify that the server hostname matches a domain name in the subject's Common Name (CN) or subjectAltName field of the X.509 certificate, which allows man-in-the-middle attackers to spoof SSL servers via an arbitrary valid certificate.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> As of 2013-12-09, no upstream patch

criterions.comment: axis2c: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
